long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▶️ Rumble Downloader features
✓ No password or login required
✓ Simple and easy to use
✓ 24/7 developer support

🤔 How to use the Rumble Downloader?
Once installed, a download button will appear under all videos, enabling you to save media content to your device.

💳 Pricing, Return and Refund Policy
● Access all features for just $18.99/month. No account required to sign up, and you can cancel at any time, no questions asked!
● No functionality of this extension is available unless you are subscribed to a paid subscription.
● The available payment methods are Credit/Debit cards.
● Google is not the seller of this service.

📝 Disclaimer 
Rumble Downloader does NOT belong or is related to the official Rumble application/website in any way. It is an unofficial app that is developed and maintained independently.
